item.title: Detecting outliers: Do Not Use Standard Deviation Around the mean, Use Absolute Deviation Around the Median
item.description: Reference Christophe Leys, Christophe Ley, Olivier Klein, Philippe Bernard, Laurent Licata “Detecting outliers: Do not use standard deviation around the mean, use absolute deviation around the median” (2013) // Journal of Experimental Social Psychology. Publisher: Elsevier BV. Vol. 49. No 4. Pp. 764–766. DOI: 10.1016/j.jesp.2013.03.013 Bib @Article{leys2013, title = {Detecting outliers: Do not use standard deviation around the mean, use absolute deviation around the median}, volume = {49}, issn = {0022-1031}, url = {http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.jesp.2013.03.013}, doi = {10.1016/j.jesp.2013.03.013}, number = {4}, journal = {Journal of Experimental Social Psychology}, publisher = {Elsevier BV}, author = {Leys, Christophe and Ley, Christophe and Klein, Olivier and Bernard, Philippe and Licata, Laurent}, year = {2013}, month = {jul}, pages = {764–766} }
